MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD8 postcode area of Jedburgh. Our team are working to repair a grounded overhead power line near Oxnam Pottery however due to adverse weather conditions and the extent of the repairs required, we now expect all remaining supplies to be restored by 4:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:38pm on Friday, 4th December 2020.
